title: Miles to Km
description: In this lab, we will explore how to convert miles to kilometers using JavaScript. The purpose of this lab is to help you understand the conversion formula and apply it to a real-world scenario. By the end of this lab, you will be able to write a function that converts miles to kilometers, which can be useful in a variety of applications.

verify.name: Open the Terminal/SSH and type 'node'
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
